body:
Hey, as i said i'm Ludcha. And i would like to introduce myself to the Avicus Network!

I'm 13 years old, i'm from Sweden. I am a ''veteran/regular'' player on Overcast Network! 

And this would also be an ''AMA''. So ask me what the hell you wan't!

//Ludcha

replies.body:
Thank you Snow! 

I'll sure do that.

If you know Jasper (Ezarik), Joel_, TheNoisyBoyMC. We we're in mumble one day, and they said:
''Let's go to ''Avicus''!''. I was like: ''Wtf?''. Then they said it was a server/community like Overcast, so yeah. That's how i found about Avicus Network!
